context: This subcomponent implements techniques for understanding how neural networks represent and process information through identification and interpretation of the features they learn and utilize, providing methods to visualize and analyze what AI systems detect, prioritize, and use in their decision-making processes.
name: Feature Analysis
description: Techniques for understanding how neural networks represent and process information through identification and interpretation of the features they learn and utilize. These techniques enable visualization and attribution of model internals, making AI reasoning processes more transparent and understandable.

capabilities.name: Feature Identification
capabilities.description: Identifying learned features in neural networks

functions.name: Feature Detection
functions.description: Detect and identify features learned by AI systems

specifications.name: Feature Detection Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for detecting and identifying features learned by AI systems
requirements: Access to model weights and intermediate representations
Statistical methods for feature identification
Feature significance evaluation metrics
Multi-layer feature detection capabilities

integration.name: Feature Detection Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for feature detection with model analysis systems

techniques.name: Feature Mining Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for mining and identifying learned features in neural networks

applications.name: Neural Feature Detector
applications.description: Application that detects and identifies features learned by neural networks

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must be a compatible model with accessible weights and activations

inputs.name: layer_selection
inputs.description: Specific layers to analyze for features
inputs.constraints: Must contain valid layer identifiers present in the model

inputs.name: detection_parameters
inputs.description: Parameters controlling feature detection sensitivity and methods
inputs.constraints: Must include threshold values and detection algorithm configurations

outputs.name: detected_features
outputs.description: Array of detected features with properties and metrics
outputs.interpretation: Provides comprehensive listing of features detected in the neural network

outputs.name: feature_correlations
outputs.description: Correlations between detected features
outputs.interpretation: Shows how detected features relate to each other within the network

outputs.name: feature_significance
outputs.description: Significance scores for each detected feature
outputs.interpretation: Quantifies the importance of each feature within the neural network

functions.name: Feature Categorization
functions.description: Categorize and organize features into meaningful groups

specifications.name: Feature Categorization Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for categorizing and organizing features into meaningful groups
requirements: Feature similarity and relationship analysis
Hierarchical categorization mechanisms
Semantic grouping of related features
Category validation and refinement methodologies

integration.name: Feature Categorization Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for feature categorization with analysis frameworks

techniques.name: Feature Clustering Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for clustering similar features into meaningful categories

applications.name: Feature Categorization System
applications.description: Application that categorizes neural network features into meaningful groups

inputs.name: detected_features
inputs.description: Array of features to be categorized
inputs.constraints: Must contain feature objects with sufficient metadata for categorization

inputs.name: similarity_metrics
inputs.description: Metrics for determining feature similarity
inputs.constraints: Must define distance or similarity functions appropriate for neural features

inputs.name: categorization_parameters
inputs.description: Parameters controlling categorization processes
inputs.constraints: Must include clustering parameters and threshold values

outputs.name: feature_categories
outputs.description: Hierarchical categorization of features
outputs.interpretation: Provides organized grouping of features into meaningful categories

outputs.name: category_relationships
outputs.description: Relationships between different feature categories
outputs.interpretation: Reveals how feature categories relate to each other conceptually

outputs.name: category_descriptions
outputs.description: Semantic descriptions of identified categories
outputs.interpretation: Offers human-understandable explanations of what each category represents

functions.name: Feature Extraction
functions.description: Extract and visualize what features an AI system has learned

specifications.name: Feature Extraction Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for extracting and analyzing learned features from neural networks
requirements: Access to model weights and activations at different network layers
Statistical methods for identifying relevant features and patterns
Dimensionality reduction techniques for processing high-dimensional feature spaces
Visualization capabilities for human-interpretable representation of features

integration.name: Feature Extraction Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for feature extraction with model architecture and visualization systems

techniques.name: Activation Maximization Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for optimizing inputs to maximize the activation of specific neurons or channels

applications.name: Neuron Visualization System
applications.description: Implementation of neuron visualization through activation maximization and related techniques

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model with accessible weights and activations
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to internal activation patterns and weights

inputs.name: target_neurons
inputs.description: Specific neurons or channels to visualize
inputs.constraints: Must specify valid neuron identifiers in the model architecture

inputs.name: optimization_params
inputs.description: Parameters controlling the optimization process for feature visualization
inputs.constraints: Must include learning rate, regularization settings, and optimization constraints

outputs.name: feature_visualizations
outputs.description: Visual representations of features that activate specific neurons
outputs.interpretation: Generates images that maximally activate the targeted neurons, revealing what they detect

outputs.name: activation_statistics
outputs.description: Statistical information about neuron activations
outputs.interpretation: Provides quantitative analysis of how neurons activate across different inputs

outputs.name: feature_interpretations
outputs.description: Human-readable interpretations of identified features
outputs.interpretation: Translates neural activations into semantic descriptions of detected concepts

techniques.name: Neuron Analysis Technique
techniques.description: Studying individual neurons or groups of neurons to understand their roles and behaviors within a network

applications.name: Concept Detection System
applications.description: Identifying specialized neurons that detect specific concepts

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to internal neuron activations across layers

inputs.name: labeled_examples
inputs.description: Examples with concept labels for detection
inputs.constraints: Must include diverse examples with accurate concept annotations

inputs.name: detection_config
inputs.description: Configuration parameters for concept detection
inputs.constraints: Must include activation thresholds and detection sensitivity settings

outputs.name: concept_neuron_mappings
outputs.description: Mappings between concepts and neurons that detect them
outputs.interpretation: Identifies specific neurons that consistently respond to particular concepts

outputs.name: concept_sensitivity
outputs.description: Sensitivity measures of neurons to specific concepts
outputs.interpretation: Quantifies how strongly each neuron responds to different concepts

outputs.name: interpretability_datasets
outputs.description: Datasets for interpreting neuron behaviors
outputs.interpretation: Provides curated examples that best demonstrate neuron concept responses

applications.name: Circuit Analysis System
applications.description: Understanding how groups of neurons work together in functional circuits

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to weights and activations between neurons

inputs.name: activation_data
inputs.description: Activation data for circuit analysis
inputs.constraints: Must include activation patterns across diverse inputs

inputs.name: circuit_params
inputs.description: Parameters for circuit detection and analysis
inputs.constraints: Must include connection thresholds and circuit definition criteria

outputs.name: circuit_diagrams
outputs.description: Visual representations of neural circuits
outputs.interpretation: Provides graphical visualizations of connected neuron groups that form functional circuits

outputs.name: pathway_analyses
outputs.description: Analyses of information pathways through the network
outputs.interpretation: Details how information flows through identified circuits between input and output

outputs.name: circuit_behaviors
outputs.description: Behavioral patterns of identified circuits
outputs.interpretation: Characterizes how circuits respond to different input patterns and their functional roles

functions.name: Pattern Detection
functions.description: Detect and analyze patterns in neural network activations and behavior

specifications.name: Pattern Detection Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for detecting and analyzing activation patterns in neural networks
requirements: Analysis of activation patterns across multiple inputs and network layers
Statistical correlation analysis between neurons and activation clusters
Detection of recurring patterns and motifs in network behavior
Tracking of information flow through network pathways

integration.name: Pattern Detection Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for pattern detection with neural network analysis frameworks

techniques.name: Activation Clustering Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for clustering similar activation patterns to identify recurring motifs

applications.name: Neural Pattern Analyzer
applications.description: Implementation of activation pattern analysis across neural network layers

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to activation patterns across all layers

inputs.name: input_dataset
inputs.description: Dataset of inputs to process through the network
inputs.constraints: Must include diverse and representative input examples

inputs.name: analysis_config
inputs.description: Configuration parameters for pattern detection algorithms
inputs.constraints: Must specify clustering parameters and similarity thresholds

outputs.name: activation_patterns
outputs.description: Identified patterns in neural activations
outputs.interpretation: Reveals recurring activation motifs across different network inputs

outputs.name: pattern_relationships
outputs.description: Relationships and correlations between detected patterns
outputs.interpretation: Shows how different activation patterns relate to each other

outputs.name: information_pathways
outputs.description: Identified pathways of information flow through the network
outputs.interpretation: Maps how information propagates through activation patterns in the network

capabilities.name: Representation Visualization
capabilities.description: Visualizing internal representations in human-understandable forms

functions.name: Latent Space Mapping
functions.description: Map and visualize the latent space of neural networks

specifications.name: Latent Space Mapping Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for mapping and visualizing neural network latent spaces
requirements: Dimensionality reduction for high-dimensional latent spaces
Interactive visualization of latent space structures
Trajectory and manifold identification within latent spaces
Semantic annotation of latent space regions

integration.name: Latent Space Mapping Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for latent space mapping with visualization systems

techniques.name: Dimensionality Reduction Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for reducing high-dimensional latent spaces for visualization

applications.name: Latent Space Visualizer
applications.description: Application that maps and visualizes neural network latent spaces

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model whose latent space will be mapped
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to internal representations at specified layers

inputs.name: target_layers
inputs.description: Specific layers whose latent spaces will be mapped
inputs.constraints: Must identify valid layers within the model architecture

inputs.name: sample_data
inputs.description: Sample data points for latent space projection
inputs.constraints: Must include representative data points covering the input distribution

outputs.name: latent_map
outputs.description: Visualization of the mapped latent space
outputs.interpretation: Provides dimensionally-reduced visualization of the high-dimensional latent space

outputs.name: cluster_analysis
outputs.description: Analysis of clusters and structures in the latent space
outputs.interpretation: Identifies meaningful clusters and patterns in the latent space representations

outputs.name: semantic_annotations
outputs.description: Semantic annotations of latent space regions
outputs.interpretation: Connects regions in latent space to human-understandable concepts

techniques.name: Representation Analysis Technique
techniques.description: Methods for analyzing internal representations and embeddings to understand what information models encode

applications.name: Embedding Space Probing
applications.description: Probing embedding spaces to understand encoded semantic features

inputs.name: model_embeddings
inputs.description: Neural network embeddings to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to embedding vectors with sufficient metadata

inputs.name: probe_concepts
inputs.description: Concepts to probe for in the embeddings
inputs.constraints: Must include well-defined concepts with example instances

inputs.name: probe_config
inputs.description: Configuration for embedding probing
inputs.constraints: Must specify probing methodology and detection thresholds

outputs.name: representation_maps
outputs.description: Maps of how concepts are represented in embeddings
outputs.interpretation: Shows how different concepts are encoded within the embedding space

outputs.name: concept_vectors
outputs.description: Vectors representing concepts in embedding space
outputs.interpretation: Provides vector representations of concepts for further analysis and comparison

outputs.name: embedding_analyses
outputs.description: Analyses of embedding space structure and properties
outputs.interpretation: Reveals properties of the embedding space such as clustering and semantic relationships

applications.name: Activation Space Analysis
applications.description: Analyzing patterns in activation space to identify feature relationships

inputs.name: activation_vectors
inputs.description: Activation vectors from the neural network
inputs.constraints: Must include activation patterns from multiple inputs and layers

inputs.name: model_outputs
inputs.description: Outputs corresponding to activation vectors
inputs.constraints: Must align with activation vectors for correlation analysis

inputs.name: analysis_params
inputs.description: Parameters for activation space analysis
inputs.constraints: Must specify dimensionality reduction and clustering parameters

outputs.name: activation_clusters
outputs.description: Clusters of similar activations
outputs.interpretation: Groups similar activation patterns to reveal functional units in the network

outputs.name: feature_directions
outputs.description: Principal directions corresponding to features
outputs.interpretation: Identifies main axes of variation in the activation space that correspond to features

outputs.name: feature_relationships
outputs.description: Relationships between different features in activation space
outputs.interpretation: Maps how different features relate to each other in the activation space

specifications.name: Activation Visualization Specifications

integration.description: Integration approach for activation visualization with model inspection frameworks

techniques.name: Activation Heatmap Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for visualizing neuron activations using heatmaps and similar visualization methods

applications.name: Activation Explorer
applications.description: Application for exploring and visualizing neural network activations

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must be a compatible model with accessible internal activations

inputs.name: input_data
inputs.description: Input data to process through the model
inputs.constraints: Must include representative examples that trigger diverse activation patterns

inputs.name: target_layers
inputs.description: Specific layers to visualize activations for
inputs.constraints: Must specify valid layer identifiers within the model architecture

outputs.name: activation_visualizations
outputs.description: Visual representations of neuron activations
outputs.interpretation: Provides visual depictions of activation patterns across network layers and inputs

outputs.name: activation_statistics
outputs.description: Statistical summaries of activation patterns
outputs.interpretation: Summarizes activation distribution characteristics across neurons and layers

outputs.name: interactive_exploration
outputs.description: Interactive tools for exploring activations
outputs.interpretation: Enables dynamic investigation of activation patterns through interactive visualizations

functions.name: Feature Visualization

specifications.name: Feature Visualization Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for generating interpretable visualizations of neural network features
requirements: Techniques for optimizing inputs to maximize neuron activations
Regularization methods to ensure human-interpretable visualizations

Interactive interfaces for exploring feature visualizations

integration.name: Feature Visualization Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for feature visualization with interpretability frameworks

techniques.name: Lucid Visualization Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for generating clear, interpretable visualizations of neural network features

applications.name: Feature Rendering System
applications.description: Implementation of feature visualization techniques for neural network interpretation

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model with features to visualize
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to internal weights and activations for feature visualization

inputs.name: visualization_targets
inputs.description: Target neurons, channels, or feature maps to visualize
inputs.constraints: Must specify valid targets within the model architecture

inputs.name: rendering_options
inputs.description: Parameters controlling the visualization process and style
inputs.constraints: Must include visualization parameters like optimization settings and regularization

outputs.name: feature_images
outputs.description: Visual representations of neural network features
outputs.interpretation: Provides synthetic images that maximally activate specific neurons or features

outputs.name: feature_metadata
outputs.description: Information about the visualized features and their properties
outputs.interpretation: Contextualizes visualizations with details about their network location and behavior

outputs.name: interactive_visualizations
outputs.description: Interactive interfaces for exploring feature visualizations
outputs.interpretation: Enables dynamic exploration of feature visualizations across different parameters

functions.name: Concept Mapping
functions.description: Map high-level concepts to their representations within neural networks

specifications.name: Concept Mapping Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for mapping high-level concepts to neural network representations
requirements: Methods for defining and representing human-understandable concepts
Techniques for identifying concept activations across network layers
Quantification of concept sensitivity and importance
Tools for exploring concept representations interactively

integration.name: Concept Mapping Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for concept mapping with model interpretability frameworks

techniques.name: TCAV Technique
techniques.description: Testing with Concept Activation Vectors to quantify concept sensitivity

applications.name: Concept Analysis System
applications.description: Implementation of concept analysis using TCAV and related techniques

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to internal activations for concept testing

inputs.name: concept_examples
inputs.description: Examples of concepts to test for in the network
inputs.constraints: Must include positive and negative examples for each concept

inputs.name: mapping_configuration
inputs.description: Configuration for concept mapping algorithms
inputs.constraints: Must specify layer selection and concept testing parameters

outputs.name: concept_activations
outputs.description: Quantitative measures of concept activation in the network
outputs.interpretation: Shows how strongly different network components respond to tested concepts

outputs.name: concept_maps
outputs.description: Mappings between concepts and neural network components
outputs.interpretation: Links human-understandable concepts to specific neural network structures

outputs.name: concept_hierarchy
outputs.description: Hierarchical organization of concepts detected in the network
outputs.interpretation: Reveals relationships and dependencies between detected concepts

techniques.name: Dimensionality Reduction Technique
techniques.description: Methods to project high-dimensional representations into lower-dimensional spaces for analysis and visualization

applications.name: Embedding Visualization
applications.description: Visualizing embeddings to understand semantic relationships between concepts

inputs.name: model_embeddings
inputs.description: Neural network embeddings to visualize
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to embedding vectors with dimensional metadata

inputs.name: labeled_examples
inputs.description: Examples with labels for visualization
inputs.constraints: Must include diverse examples with accurate concept labels

inputs.name: visualization_params
inputs.description: Parameters for embedding visualization
inputs.constraints: Must specify dimensionality reduction method and visualization options

outputs.name: 2d_projections
outputs.description: 2D projections of high-dimensional embeddings

outputs.name: 3d_visualizations
outputs.description: 3D visualizations of embedding spaces
outputs.interpretation: Offers richer spatial understanding of embedding structure

outputs.name: semantic_maps
outputs.description: Maps showing semantic relationships in embedding space
outputs.interpretation: Reveals conceptual organization and proximity in the embedding space

capabilities.name: Importance Quantification
capabilities.description: Quantifying the importance of features in model decision-making

functions.name: Feature Attribution
functions.description: Attribute model decisions to specific features or inputs

specifications.name: Feature Attribution Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for attributing model decisions to specific input features
requirements: Algorithms for computing feature importance scores
Methods for handling both local and global attributions
Visualization techniques for displaying attribution results
Support for different model architectures and input types

integration.name: Feature Attribution Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for feature attribution with explanation systems

techniques.name: Gradient-based Attribution Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for attributing predictions to input features using gradient-based methods

applications.name: Feature Attribution System
applications.description: Application for attributing model decisions to specific input features

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Machine learning model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must provide access to gradients or be compatible with black-box attribution

inputs.name: input_instance
inputs.description: Specific input instance to explain
inputs.constraints: Must be properly formatted for the model and include all required fields

inputs.name: target_output
inputs.description: Target output or decision to explain
inputs.constraints: Must refer to a valid output class or decision produced by the model

outputs.name: feature_importance
outputs.description: Importance scores for each input feature
outputs.interpretation: Quantifies which input features most influenced the model prediction

outputs.name: attribution_visualization
outputs.description: Visual representation of attribution results
outputs.interpretation: Provides intuitive visualization of feature importance across the input

outputs.name: explanation_summary
outputs.description: Human-readable summary of the attribution results
outputs.interpretation: Translates attribution data into natural language explanation

functions.name: Attribution Analysis
functions.description: Analyzing what model features contribute to specific predictions

specifications.name: Attribution Analysis Specifications
specifications.description: Technical specifications for attributing neural network predictions to input features
requirements: Methods for attributing model predictions to input features
Axiomatic approaches to attribution with theoretical guarantees
Visualization techniques for displaying attribution maps
Algorithms for analyzing attribution across multiple instances

integration.name: Attribution Analysis Integration
integration.description: Integration approach for attribution analysis with interpretability frameworks

techniques.name: Integrated Gradients Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for attributing predictions to input features using integrated gradients

applications.name: Attribution Engine
applications.description: Implementation of attribution analysis techniques for neural network interpretation

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must be differentiable or support integrated gradients computation

inputs.name: input_samples
inputs.description: Sample inputs for attribution analysis
inputs.constraints: Must include properly formatted inputs representing the target distribution

inputs.name: attribution_config
inputs.description: Configuration parameters for attribution algorithms
inputs.constraints: Must specify attribution method and appropriate parameters

outputs.name: attribution_maps
outputs.description: Visual maps showing feature importance for each prediction
outputs.interpretation: Highlights which parts of each input most influenced the model's decision

outputs.name: feature_importance
outputs.description: Quantitative measures of feature importance for model decisions
outputs.interpretation: Provides numerical assessment of each feature's contribution to predictions

outputs.name: attribution_statistics
outputs.description: Statistical analysis of attribution patterns across samples
outputs.interpretation: Reveals patterns and trends in how the model attributes importance

techniques.name: Gradient Visualization Technique
techniques.description: Methods for visualizing gradients of model outputs with respect to inputs to understand feature importance

applications.name: Gradient Saliency Mapping
applications.description: Computing saliency maps based on input gradients to highlight important regions

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Neural network model to analyze
inputs.constraints: Must be differentiable with respect to inputs

inputs.name: input_examples
inputs.description: Input examples to generate saliency maps for
inputs.constraints: Must be properly formatted inputs compatible with the model

inputs.name: target_outputs
inputs.description: Target outputs or classes for gradient calculation
inputs.constraints: Must specify valid output classes or values for the model

outputs.name: saliency_maps
outputs.description: Visual maps highlighting important regions in inputs
outputs.interpretation: Shows which input regions most affect the model's output

outputs.name: gradient_statistics
outputs.description: Statistical information about gradient patterns
outputs.interpretation: Provides quantitative analysis of gradient behavior across inputs

outputs.name: attribution_visualizations
outputs.description: Visualizations of feature attributions based on gradients
outputs.interpretation: Offers visual representations of gradient-based feature importance

outputs.name: feature_influence_maps

outputs.description: Analysis of how changes in features would affect model decisions

outputs.description: Clusters of features with similar correlation patterns
outputs.interpretation: Groups related features that exhibit similar correlative behavior

cross_connections.description: Feature identification provides the underlying features that representation visualization then renders in human-understandable forms
Representation visualization provides visual context that importance quantification enhances with attribution information
Importance quantification guides feature identification by highlighting significant features for deeper analysis
Relationship mapping extends importance quantification by analyzing relationships between important features
Feature extraction methods directly feed the feature visualization process with extracted neural representations

implementation_considerations.name: Computational Efficiency
considerations: Balancing analysis depth with computational resource requirements
Employing efficient approximation methods for high-dimensional feature spaces
Implementing progressive refinement for interactive analysis scenarios
Optimizing memory usage for large model analysis
Parallel processing of independent feature analysis tasks

implementation_considerations.name: Model Architecture Agnosticism
considerations: Developing analysis methods that work across different neural network architectures
Creating modular interfaces that adapt to various model structures
Standardizing feature representations independent of model implementation
Supporting both white-box and black-box analysis approaches
Accommodating different data types and domains with minimal adaptation

implementation_considerations.name: Human Interpretability
considerations: Translating technical neural representations into human-understandable concepts
Aligning visualizations with human cognitive processes and intuition
Providing appropriate levels of simplification without sacrificing accuracy
Supporting interactive exploration to facilitate discovery
Integrating domain knowledge to enhance interpretation relevance

implementation_considerations.name: Fidelity and Reliability
considerations: Ensuring feature analysis accurately represents model behavior
Quantifying uncertainty in feature importance estimations
Verifying consistency of analysis across similar inputs
Detecting potential artifacts or misleading interpretations
Validating analysis results against ground truth when available

technical_specifications.description: This section provides technical details about the feature analysis subcomponent.

input_requirements.name: Model Access
input_requirements.description: Access to neural network model internals for analysis
input_requirements.constraints: Requires appropriate level of access based on analysis method (white-box or black-box)

input_requirements.name: Input Data
input_requirements.description: Sample inputs for analyzing model behavior and features
input_requirements.constraints: Must be representative of the target distribution and usage scenarios

input_requirements.name: Concept Examples
input_requirements.description: Examples of human-understandable concepts for mapping to neural representations
input_requirements.constraints: Requires clear concept definitions and representative examples

input_requirements.name: Ground Truth Annotations
input_requirements.description: Verified annotations for validating feature analysis results
input_requirements.constraints: Requires domain expertise and consistency in annotation

output_specifications.name: Feature Visualizations
output_specifications.description: Visual representations of features learned by neural networks
output_specifications.interpretation: Understanding what patterns and concepts models have learned

output_specifications.name: Attribution Maps
output_specifications.description: Maps showing feature importance for model decisions
output_specifications.interpretation: Explaining which parts of the input most influenced model decisions

output_specifications.name: Concept Mappings
output_specifications.description: Mappings between human concepts and neural representations
output_specifications.interpretation: Translating between neural representations and human-understandable concepts

output_specifications.name: Feature Relationships
output_specifications.description: Analysis of relationships between features in neural networks
output_specifications.interpretation: Understanding how features interact and relate to each other

output_specifications.name: Alignment Assessments
output_specifications.description: Assessments of neural feature alignment with human values and intentions
output_specifications.interpretation: Evaluating whether learned features align with intended model purposes

performance_characteristics.throughput: Feature visualization generation should support at least 10 visualizations per minute for interactive use
performance_characteristics.latency: Attribution mapping should complete within 100ms for real-time explanation of model decisions
performance_characteristics.scalability: Analysis techniques should scale to handle models with billions of parameters through appropriate abstraction
performance_characteristics.resource_utilization: Feature analysis should require no more than 2x the memory footprint of the analyzed model

relationships.description: This section details how feature analysis relates to other components and subcomponents in the architecture.

items.description: Feature analysis provides the underlying feature information that explanation systems translate into human-understandable explanations, while explanation systems inform feature analysis about explanatory needs
Feature analysis informs mechanistic interpretability by identifying relevant features, while mechanistic interpretability provides deeper understanding of how features are processed
Feature analysis helps identify features relevant to value alignment, while adaptive value learning guides feature analysis to focus on value-relevant aspects
Feature analysis provides insights into model behavior that support oversight, while oversight mechanisms direct feature analysis to areas requiring scrutiny
Feature analysis enables more transparent human-AI interaction through feature visualization, while interaction insights guide feature analysis focus

references.venue: IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition

references.venue: Proceedings of the 35th International Conference on Machine Learning

references.title: A Unified Approach to Interpreting Model Predictions
references.venue: Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems

references.title: Sanity Checks for Saliency Maps
references.venue: Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems

references.title: Interpreting Deep Visual Representations via Network Dissection
references.venue: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence

references.title: Grad-CAM: Visual Explanations from Deep Networks via Gradient-based Localization
references.venue: IEEE International Conference on Computer Vision

references.title: SmoothGrad: removing noise by adding noise
On the importance of single directions for generalization

literature_connections.relevant_aspects: Establishes fundamental methods for visualizing what features neural networks have learned
Presents network dissection approach to quantify the interpretability of neural network representations
Introduces LIME, a technique for attributing predictions to input features through local surrogate models
Develops Integrated Gradients method with axiomatic approach to feature attribution
Introduces TCAV method for testing concept sensitivity in neural networks
Presents SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations) as a unified approach to feature attribution
Demonstrates visualization of neural network activations at scale through dimensionality reduction
Provides critical evaluation of saliency methods for feature attribution
Extends network dissection to interpret deep visual representations and categorize detected features
Introduces Grad-CAM for visual explanations through gradient-based localization
Presents SmoothGrad technique to improve gradient-based feature attribution
Investigates the importance of individual neurons for model generalization
